entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
